Want to remove the warning about creating a directory? Use a one line if statement.

```{r, eval = F}
    # check for directory existence. Create it if not found
    outdir <- paste0(here("Output/"),Sys.Date())
    if (!dir.exists(outdir)) {dir.create(outdir) }
```

Update 5/6/2023: a better method is to use `fs::dir_create()`, which will do nothing if the directory already exists.
